}} 'Another Country' is a studio album by singer-songwriter Tift Merritt. It was
recorded in the summer of 2007, produced in L.A. by George Drakoulias, and
released on February 26, 2008 by Fantasy Records. For her third album, Tift
Merritt took hiatus with a piano in Paris and came home with her most personal
and powerful songs to date. Merritt has described the writing as a plainspoken
look at the distance we all attempt to cross: between two people, between one
heart and the rest of the world.

In its first week of release, the album's first single "Broken" reached #1 on
the Americana Radio Chart compiled by the Americana Music Association. This is
her second time working with producer George Drakoulias, who produced her last
studio album [[Tambourine (album)|Tambourine]].
